title: Is it possible to disconnect my HP wireless printer? - Quora

response.answer_text: if you still wish to keep the hp printer keep it plugged in to the A/C but keep it dormant do the following turn of your HP printer on you computer go to settings go to printer you will see your see your H P printer got to the bottom of the. Screen you will see a plus sign and a minus sign click on minus sign your HP printer will be removed if you want ever reinstall the printer again just go back on the printer settings turn on the wireless n printer press the pluss sigb your printer will be reinstalled
